name: Hot Shots Golf: Open Tee 2
description:
Step out of the clubhouse and onto the tee box with Hot Shots Golf Open Tee® 2. The classic, entertaining golf franchise returns to the PSP® system with new quirky characters, beautiful courses and a huge variety of customizable options that enable you to take your golf game wherever you go.
Use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not use this item. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 console systems and 2 portable systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
Hot Shots Golf: Open Tee is a registered trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment America Inc. © 2008 Sony Computer Entertainment Inc.
